articles.author: Vivian Ho
articles.title: Health officials grapple with deadly mystery ‘Disease X’ in Congo - The Washington Post
articles.description: The mysterious flu-like disease has killed dozens in the central African country of the Democratic Republic of Congo, mostly women and children, officials said.
articles.content:
A mysterious, flu-like disease has killed dozens in the southwest region of the Democratic Republic of Congo, with women and children among the most affected, health officials said Thursday.
